start.text: Aiyaya, these are the captain's enemy, they seem weak
No worries, Captain, Ria will take care of the trash.
Mhm, Ria wouldn't say no to garbage cleaning task for the captain

start_boss.text: Ria felt that ship looks a bit familar

retreat.text: Aiya, Ria will retreat first, don't forget your promise with Ria, Captain

out_of_missiles.text: A shame, only prepared this much missile. The enmy didn't even get to enjoy it
What kind of missile to use next, the ones to electrcute the inside of a ship, or the ones that slowly heat it up?

engaged.text: Heheh, did you miss Ria, Captain?
Captain, gotta make it clear, Ria isn't helping for free. Remeber to come to Ria's room after~

need_help.text: Captain, come help ria, I'll give the captain some ‘reward’~
Ugh, if captain don't come help Ria, the ‘reward’ later is going to be cancelled~

pursuing.text: What kind of weapon to use, one can get the Captain's attention will be best

running.text: Ria is taking a break, come fill the line, Captain~
Who would've thought commanding a ship is so tiring, I really hope captain can be Ria's chair right now

hull_90.text: Even though this is a ship the Captain bought for Ria, I will not allow you to ruin the Captain's gift like this!
A shame, I will have to use the moves I saved for the Captain on you guys

hull_50.text: Ugh, Ria can't hold back these piggys
Disobedient kid is going to get demolished~

overload.text: Power is out, that's not good

death.text: Aiya, I will have to properly punish the Captain after this, you will have to focus on commanding
Ria tried her best to save these kids, Captain will have to explain to Ria tonight about the mistakes in command~

victory.text: This is Ria's captain~ Ria will properly‘reward’ the captain tonight~
What a shame, was hoping I could properly ‘punish’ the captain. Then congradulation on the victory~
How did Ria do? Shouldn't you show some appreciation tonight, captain?
